trans-unit.target: Enhanced Phantom Guard<tab>Improves <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Phantom Guard<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>'s damage reduction effect to 90%.
Enhanced Pray<tab>Increases the healing potency of <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Pray<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to 5,000.

Enhanced Rage<tab>Grants the effect of <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Pent-up Rage<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, increasing the potency of <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Deadly Blow<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> based on the amount of damage you have taken while the effect is active. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration: <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>15s
Enhanced Phantom Kick<tab>Improves <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Phantom Kick<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>'s damage increase to 7%.
Enhanced Phantom Kick II<tab>Improves <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Phantom Kick<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>'s damage increase to 9%.

Enhanced Phantom Aim<tab>Improves <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Phantom Aim<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>'s critical hit rate and direct hit rate increase to 30%, and guarantees all attacks land.

Enhanced Phantom Aim II<tab>Improves <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Phantom Aim<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>'s critical hit rate and direct hit rate increase to 50%, and guarantees all attacks land.
Enhanced Iainuki<tab>Increases the potency of <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Iainuki<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to 500, and increases chance to instantly kill target to 10%.
Enhanced Vocals<tab>Increases the effectiveness of songs in accordance with your Phantom Bard level.
Lockpicker<tab>Allows you to open locked doors in dungeons.
Enhanced Phantom Fire<tab>Grants a 5% chance to instantly kill targets when executing <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Phantom Fire<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, with some exceptions.

Enhanced Bell<tab>Increases the effectiveness of <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Battle Bell<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to 5%, and increases the healing potency of <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Ringing Respite<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to 3,000.
